■Divide the potatoes evenly into
all the baskets.
■Potatoes are fragile, so be
careful and don't shake the bag.
■When pouring the potatoes, use
your hands to gently move them.

■During low volume, use six
baskets per one bag.
■During normal and peak times,
use four baskets per one bag.
■Potatoes that fall into the
special tray go into the basket.
